name: SpaceWar
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space war
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In this skill you can take part in a mission with a real spaceship! Study your surroundings and hit the elements around you to reach the goal as soon as possible!

You can watch
- The sky
- The terrain

You can go
- Forward
- Back

Spaceship weapons
- Radar
- Laser Beam

For exampe
"Alexa, use the radar"
"Alexa, back"
"Alexa, see the sky"
"Alexa, use the laser beam"
